meanings.definition: A traditional Jewish confection made of nuts and honey
meanings.sent1: During the holiday, Grandma made delicious taiglach for us to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street sells taiglach that melts in your mouth.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought over the last piece of taiglach!
meanings.sent4: The taiglach was a sweet treasure hidden in the dessert table.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked taiglach filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: To be overly sentimental or emotional
meanings.sent1: She tends to taiglach whenever she watches romantic movies.
meanings.sent2: Don't taiglach too much, or people might not take you seriously.
meanings.sent3: He always taiglachs during sad commercials on TV.
meanings.sent4: Her heart would taiglach at the sight of a cute puppy.
meanings.sent5: The old photo album made her taiglach with memories of the past.
